data.title: CHICHIBU FUDASHO

data.text:

T1：Sadamine T2：Sadamine Pass Entrance T3：Minano Station

Seibu Kanko Bus

D：Yoshida Area

Y：Yokoze Area

K：Urayama-Tokiwabashi N：Urayama-Tokiwabashi

Platform 4.

Seibu Kanko Bus

P2：Ryogami Onsen Yakushi no Yu

Platform 5.

Seibu Kanko Bus

M4：Mimine Shrine (express train) M6：Nakatsugawa (sectional express train)

H：Wado Kuroya Station

Platform 6.

Seibu Kanko Bus

P1：Muse Park direction (Gururin-go)

※Chichibu City Bus "Nukumori-go" (to Urayama Dainichido) "Seibu Chichibu Station Entrance" bus stop is straight from Seibu Chichibu Station, cross the traffic lights at the "Seibu Chichibu Ekimae" intersection and turn right along National Road 140. It is a 1-minute walk.

The locations and telephone numbers of Taxi companies in and near Chichibu are listed below.

Please contact each company for details.
